Title: Todo GUI
Description: This is a simple desktop-based To-Do List application built using Python and PySimpleGUI. It allows users to manage tasks through a lightweight graphical interface — add, view, and mark tasks as complete, all from a user-friendly window.

Title: Todo App
Description: This is a simple and interactive To-Do list web application built using Python and Streamlit. It allows users to add, check off, and manage their daily tasks in a clean web interface.
